actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 3 of the United States Code in order to entitle veterans to 45 months of educational assistance for undergraduate or any other authorized programs of education.

summary.text: Entitles veterans to 45 months (now 36 months) of educational assistance for undergraduate or any other authorized programs of education. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1661).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 3 of the United States Code in order to entitle veterans to 45 months of educational assistance for undergraduate or any other authorized programs of education.
